definitions.definition: A device used for injecting or drawing fluids through a membrane .
A device consisting of a hypodermic needle , a chamber for containing liquids, and a piston for applying pressure (to inject) or reducing pressure (to draw); a hypodermic syringe .

main_definition: A device used for injecting or drawing fluids through a membrane .
secondary_definitions: A device consisting of a hypodermic needle , a chamber for containing liquids, and a piston for applying pressure (to inject) or reducing pressure (to draw); a hypodermic syringe .
